Name:
Vitality
Willowherb
Fate:
Transferred to the Royal Navy, 30 August 1943
Returned to US Navy custody, 11 June 1946
Propulsion: Two 3-drum express boilers, 2,750ihp vertical triple expansion engine, one shaft.
Armament:
2 × 3"/50 dual purpose gun mounts
2 × 20 mm gun mounts
1 × Hedgehog
4 × depth charge guns
2 × depth charge chutes
